comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0b1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0b1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

How to get images blocked on particular site and particular path.

I found that images on yahoo.com and cricket.yahoo.com are stored on same server yimg.com so blocking yimg.com is blocking images on both sites though I want to block images on only one particular site.

Also, Add an option to block images on particular path of site for eg. site.com/directory

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: sunveer@ymail.com
comments.author: sunveer@ymail.com

comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text:
The image blocking functionality will probably removed in the future.
You should install adblock+ and use the adblock+ filter to block those images.
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text:
The image blocking functionality will probably removed in the future.
You should install adblock+ and use the adblock+ filter to block those images.

comments.author: sunveer@ymail.com
comments.text:
Why will the Image Blocking Functionality be removed??

It must not be done.
